actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require that, effective July 1, 1975, payment, under State plans approved under such title, for home health services shall be made on a reasonable cost related basis.

summary.text: Requires, under title XIX of the Social Security Act (Grants to States for Medical Assistance Programs-Medicaid), that, effective July 1, 1975, payment, under State plans approved under such title, for home health services shall be made on a reasonable cost related basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require that, effective July 1, 1975, payment, under State plans approved under such title, for home health services shall be made on a reasonable cost related basis.
